resources.string: We are a socially responsible company that makes tortillas with germinated creole corn of the central region of the mexican republic. Made with a nixtamalización process designed to store a high content of fiber and a high nutritional value we achieve to create a not only healthy but a delicious tortilla superior to any in the market.
